name: It Shakes the World Apart
description:
A game about making friends to curb your loneliness.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD: Move

Enter/E: Interact

Tools:

  • Unity 3D
  • PyxelEdit
  • SFXR
  • FLStudio

If you have any criticisms, leave a comment below, or tweet me!
